title: Ball Fondlers
description: This team of Special Forces mercenaries are on the mission.
altHero: a Mr. T type tough guy shoots a machine gun
alt1: smooth looking bad guys shot guns from behind a crashed and smoking Jeep
alt2: the bad guys flying through the air in an explosion
alt3: an alligator man shoots a gun while hanging on to the side of a helicopter
alt4: a Jeep flies through the air leaving a trail of smoke
